title: Rito, pls, RP. Introducing... Bardion Sol!
body:
Here, all I need is 60 RP even for Tahm Kench (currently on sale) and would love if you gave me it for this Kindergarten-level drawing I made of the new Aurelion Sol skin.

Sincerely, Darkforcefilms

Picture:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=661693401

replies.body:
Heyo,

You'll want to make a support ticket here to take care of that:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
Thanks! Rito, you my favorite company <3 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

> [{quoted}](name=Morgageddon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=A0g0W2et,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-08T22:01:40.788+0000)
>
> Heyo,
> 
> You'll want to make a support ticket here to take care of that:
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

I thought you could only get 5 rp?
